metadata.projectTitle: Smart Contract & NFT Fundraising Development for Wizkid’s A Million Blessings 5K Charity Marathon
metadata.title: Corlax Wellness paid $1262.67
metadata.message: Corlax Wellness has paid $1262.67 for your recent Phase 1 – Requirements & Contract Design for Smart Contract & NFT Fundraising Development for Wizkid’s A Million Blessings 5K Charity Marathon. This project has a remaining budget of $2525.33. Click here to view invoice details
